page.title: 09Local Entertainment
page.content: For most part of their entertainment people have to travel to the surrounding areas: many patronise the theatre in Bromyard where the local amateur group produce two or three plays a year. Also at the Bromyard theatre it is possible to see films shown on behalf of organisations such as the Nature Trust and film society. Local entertainment consists of membership of the Young Farmers Club, floral clubs. and others. Three people listed their chief entertainment as visiting the public house. The Holly Bush in Munderfield has musical evenings which are very popular. Bromyard Gala is held each year in the last week in June in the neighbouring parish of Stoke Lacy, and a very successful folk festival is held in Bromyard every autumn.
